@graph.name: Vegan Cheese Fondue - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan cheese fondue is a great and fun way to gather friends and family. It's nut-free, extremely creamy, wine-infused, and ready in only 10 minutes!

@graph.headline: Vegan Cheese Fondue
@graph.keywords: dairy free fondue,easy vegan cheese sauce,fondue for two,hot vegan cheese dip,vegan cheese dip,vegan cheese fondue,vegan cheese without nuts,vegan chocolate fondue,vegan fondue,vegan nut-free cheese,vegan nut-free cheese sauce,what is fondue

@graph.name: Vegan Cheese Fondue
@graph.description: This vegan cheese fondue is a great and fun way to gather friends and family. It's nut-free, extremely creamy, wine-infused, and ready in only 10 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup unsweetend almond or soy milk

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients (except for the flour) in a pot and cook for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients (except for the flour) in a pot and cook for about 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Then stir in the flour and wait until it all thickens up. If it's too thick add some more plant-based milk. If it's too thin add more flour. When it's ready, you can either transfer it to a caquelon or just use a regular bowl instead. However, it's better to use a real fondue pot, a so-called caquelon, as it keeps the cheese sauce hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Then stir in the flour and wait until it all thickens up. If it's too thick add some more plant-based milk. If it's too thin add more flour. When it's ready, you can either transfer it to a caquelon or just use a regular bowl instead. However, it's better to use a real fondue pot, a so-called caquelon, as it keeps the cheese sauce hot.
